basics.name: Calvan Liang
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am a student studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2021. I intend to pursue a career in Video Game Design or Multimedia Development.

Computer Lab Monitor for the UH Linguist: Assist students who cannot log into their computer and solve computer related problems
Record the amount of people in the lab every hour

volunteer.summary: Member of a three man group that competes in the Cyberpatriot monthly competition
highlights: Solve the presented scenario or problem

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students. Prerequisites include a rigorous high school curriculum and a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: 28th Annual Physics Olympics Second Place
awards.awarder: American Association of Physics Teachers, Hawaii Section
awards.summary: A competition that tested students' knowledge of physics. My group and I were challenged with various physics problems and scenarios. We placed second.

references.name: Available upon request. Contact me via email.
